game.name: LAVALAMP
game.genres: Adventure, Casual, Indie, Free To Play
game.shortDescription: 3D first-person walking simulator with a side of exploration/interaction with the environment. The game tells the story of the Space Lemmings from Space who, after running many experiments with breakfast alphabet and the space-time continuum, got blocked between dimensions (or something).
game.shortDescriptionEn: 3D first-person walking simulator with a side of exploration/interaction with the environment. The game tells the story of the Space Lemmings from Space who, after running many experiments with breakfast alphabet and the space-time continuum, got blocked between dimensions (or something).
game.developers: The Space Lemmings from Space Productions
game.publishers: The Space Lemmings from Space Productions

reviewHighlights.text: Stunning experience. The Space Lemmings From Space have changed me for the better, and I will never skip breakfast again.
